target_markets.market_description: Competitive individuals from non-wealthy backgrounds seeking success through merit
pain_points: lack of material resources despite intelligence
target_markets.market_size_indicators: People who believe in meritocratic systems but lack initial advantages

problems_validated.problem: Energy scarcity limiting global development potential
problems_validated.market_gap: Need for clean, abundant energy to enable water desalination, agriculture, and economic development

products_tools.name: Element
products_tools.use_case: Electrolyte replacement for workouts and hangover recovery
products_tools.pricing: Free sample pack with any order

products_tools.name: Fundrise
products_tools.use_case: Private real estate investing for portfolio diversification

business_strategies.strategy: Focus on elemental power (nuclear energy) as foundation for economic development
business_strategies.implementation: Invest in clean energy infrastructure to enable downstream opportunities
business_strategies.expected_results: Abundant energy enables water desalination, improved agriculture, economic growth
business_strategies.case_study: Cheaper electricity creates cascading benefits across multiple industries

problems_solutions.problem: Questioning inherited traditions and systems without logical basis
problems_solutions.solution: Apply scientific thinking - tentatively hold beliefs until better explanations emerge
steps: Question why things exist as they are
Embrace better explanations when they emerge

startup_ideas.idea: Clean energy infrastructure focused on nuclear/elemental power
startup_ideas.target_market: Governments, utilities, agricultural regions needing water/power
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Energy scarcity limiting economic development and basic needs
startup_ideas.validation: Global need for clean, abundant energy is well-established

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Following traditions without understanding their original purpose
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Question the logical foundation of inherited practices
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Cutting turkey ends for 'tradition' when original reason was pan size limitation

trends_signals.trend: Shift toward elemental/nuclear power as clean energy solution
trends_signals.opportunity: Infrastructure investment in clean energy generation

trends_signals.trend: Questioning traditional authority and inherited systems

actionable_quotes.quote: the cheaper your electricity the more power you have you can desalinate water you could have abundant water you could have abundant crops in agriculture but it all starts with how do we get clean abundant energy
actionable_quotes.context: Opening statement about energy as foundation for economic development
actionable_quotes.actionability: Focus investment and business development on energy infrastructure as multiplier for other opportunities

actionable_quotes.quote: a scientific world view is basically trying to come up with better explanations and at best they can be tentatively held until a better explanation yet further comes along
actionable_quotes.context: Discussing approach to knowledge and decision-making
actionable_quotes.actionability: Maintain intellectual humility while pursuing business strategies - be willing to pivot when better information emerges

key_statistics.statistic: 1000mg sodium, 200 milligrams potassium and 60 milligrams of magnesium
